document.full_text: forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh battled with tribal fighters in yemen's capital on thursday in clashes that killed dozens as u.s. envoy john brennan flew around the region to try to stop a looming civil war.
document.title: yemen fighting intensifies, envoy brennan in talks
lines_and_colors: forces loyal to president ali abdullah saleh battled with tribal fighters in yemen's capital on thursday in clashes that killed dozens as u.s. envoy john brennan flew around the region to try to stop a looming civil war.
